amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete title III which establishes the Advisory Commission on National Security Revitalization.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (numbered 1 as printed in the Congressional Record) to strike Title III which establishes a bipartisan commission to review U.S. defense needs and priorities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harman amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 211 (Roll no. 141).
